snippet: The latest jobs report is just one more reason for Americans to wonder if this recovery will ever lead to broad prosperity.
abstract: Editorial asserts that the March employment report raises the question of whether the economic recovery will ever lead to broad prosperity; contends that until the self-reinforcing, virtuous cycle of growth takes firm hold, the need for the federal government to implement policies that help middle- and low-income families remains high.
lead_paragraph: The latest jobs report is just one more reason for Americans to wonder if this recovery will ever lead to broad prosperity.

headline.seo: Still Crawling Out of a Very Deep Hole
headline.main: Still Crawling Out of a Very Deep Hole
headline.print_headline: Still Crawling Out Of a Very Deep Hole
